Description:
IN served - You have not ensured that employee exposure to a substance hazardous to health, welding fume (a known carcinogen) has been prevented or adequately controlled. You have not provided equipment to control exposure at source i.e. to minimise emission and release of fume into the workshop and the breathing zone of employees.

IN served - You have not provided health surveillance to employees who are or are liable to be exposed to a substance hazardous to health, namely stainless steel welding fume. Health surveillance is necessary because there is a reasonable likelihood of occupational disease (asthma) occurring due to exposure in your work place and there are valid techniques for detecting indications of the disease or effect.
